data.eml:eml: Sponges from Clipperton Island, East Pacific

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Van, Rob W. M., Kaiser, Kirstie L., Syoc, Robert Van (2011): Sponges from Clipperton Island, East Pacific. Zootaxa 2839: 1-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.320220
